meanings.definition: The action of formally investing a person with honors or rank.
meanings.sent1: During the investitures, the leader bestowed honors upon the brave soldiers.
meanings.sent2: The investitures at the ceremony marked the official recognition of their achievements.
meanings.sent3: At the investitures, everyone received a shiny badge as a symbol of their hard work.
meanings.sent4: The investitures were like a magical transformation, turning ordinary citizens into respected officials.
meanings.sent5: The investitures were a grand event, making the recipients feel truly special.

meanings.definition: The formal bestowal of the symbols of office or rank.
meanings.sent1: The investitures included handing over the keys to the new office.
meanings.sent2: The investitures ceremony featured the presentation of the official uniform.
meanings.sent3: During the investitures, each person received a unique badge representing their role.
meanings.sent4: The investitures were like passing the torch of responsibility to the next generation.
meanings.sent5: The investitures were a symbolic moment, signifying the beginning of their new roles.

meanings.definition: The ceremony of investing a person with the insignia of an office.
meanings.sent1: The investitures involved the solemn placement of the office badge.
meanings.sent2: At the investitures, the official seal was handed over to the new leader.
meanings.sent3: During the investitures, each person proudly wore the office emblem.
meanings.sent4: The investitures felt like a royal coronation, with the office symbols gleaming.
meanings.sent5: The investitures were a moment of pride, as the insignia marked their official roles.
